item.description:
Would you like to increase your sales?  Come check out our newest Manchester Referral Club called the Manchester Business Network.  We are a group of professionals looking to find the same to refer business to!  We are not a leads group, we are a referral group.  The difference is referrals have a 75 % chance of turning into business while a lead is a whole lot of nothing.

Do you need more referrals?  What are you waiting for.  Join us at Blakes on Thursday morning and bring your business cards.  Chances are, there is a referral waiting for you!
item.name: Manchester NH Business Network
